name: Get Invite

query.name: with_counts
query.description: whether the invite should contain approximate member counts

query.name: with_expiration
query.description: whether the invite should contain the expiration date

query.name: guild_scheduled_event_id
query.description: the guild scheduled event to include with the invite

description: Returns an invite object for the given code.

name: Delete Invite
description: Delete an invite. Requires the MANAGE_CHANNELS permission on the channel this invite belongs to, or MANAGE_GUILD to remove any invite across the guild. Returns an invite object on success. Fires a Invite Delete Gateway event.
